column2: We rubber plants form the connecting link between the vegetable kingdom and the decorations of a Waldorf-Astoria scene in a Third Avenue theatre.

column2: I haven't looked up our family tree, but I believe we were raised by grafting a gum overshoe on to a 30-cent table d'hote stalk of asparagus.

column2: What the shamrock is to Ireland the rubber plant is to the dweller in flats and furnished rooms.
